entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 5:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
